org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure
Class GridSite

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.GridSite

public class GridSite
extends java.lang.Object

A GridSite keeps track of the CEs and SEs on a site.

Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

Constructor Detail

GridSite

public GridSite()
Construct a new GridSite object. Its site ID is set to be 1 higher than the last GridSite.

Method Detail

associateNeighbours

public void associateNeighbours()
This function asks the GridContainer to find all neighbouring sites and stores them locally for speed.

public int exposeIndex()
Get the index of this GridSite.

Returns:
the site's index.

Check whether a GridJob is in the list of acceptable jobs and if so, accept it.

Parameters:
job - the GridJob to check
Returns:
true if the GridJob is in the list of acceptable jobs, false otherwise.

Method to print out the current state of the GridSite.

hasSEs

public boolean hasSEs()
Check whether or not there are any StorageElements at this site.

Returns:
true if there is an SE, false otherwise.

startAllCEs

public void startAllCEs()
Start all the ComputingElement threads at this site running.

waitForAllCEsToFinish

public void waitForAllCEsToFinish()
Called by the GridContainer when shutting down ComputingElements, so that they will only shut down when all their jobs have been processed.

public void shutDownAllCEs()
Shut down all the ComputingElements at this GridSite.

Enumeration over the StorageElements.

iAm

public boolean iAm(int index)
Method for determining if a particular index corresponds to this GridSite

Parameters:
index - the number associated with a GridSite
Returns:
true if this site is the referred site, false otherwise.

addFileToRandomSE

public DataFile addFileToRandomSE(DataFile file)
Routine to add a file to one of the registered SEs at this site. The order in which the SEs are selected to attempt to store the file is randomised.

Parameters:
file - The datafile we wish to add
Returns:
PFN of file if file was successfully added, null otherwise

hasCE

public boolean hasCE(int index)
Method to check if a particular site has a CE with given index as its reference

Parameters:
index - The CE ID we are looking for
Returns:
true if a CE on this site has the ID

hasCE

public boolean hasCE()
Method to check if a site has at least one CE

Returns:
true if the site has a CE

countCEs

public int countCEs()
Counts all the ComputingElements at this site.

Returns:
The number of CEs at this site

getCE

public ComputingElement getCE()
Return the first CE at a site

Returns:
The first CE, or null if site has no CEs

getSE

public StorageElement getSE()
Return the first SE at a site

Returns:
The first SE, or null if site has no CEs

getCloseSE

public StorageElement getCloseSE()
Return the CloseSE for this site. Currently it just returns the first SE TODO: fix assumption that CloseSE is always the first one.

Returns:
The close SE or null if there isn't one

fillSEsWithFiles

public java.util.Iterator fillSEsWithFiles(java.util.Collection files)
Routine to attempt to fill all SEs connected to a particular site with files

Parameters:
files - the files we wish to fill the SEs with
Returns:
an iterator of PFNs for files successfully stored in the SEs
